key.name: enable-focused-app-title
key.description: If enabled, the title of the currently focused application window will be displayed in the top bar.

key.name: enable-focused-app-icon
key.description: If enabled, the icon of the currently focused application window will be displayed in the top bar.

key.name: enable-monochrome-icon
key.description: If enabled, applies a desaturation effect or uses the symbolic variant of the application icon.

key.name: enable-fixed-title-width
key.description: If enabled, the application title will have a fixed width, preventing it from resizing the top bar.

key.name: enable-move-to-workspace
key.description: If enabled, show the 'Move to New Workspace' option in the menu to move the currently focused application window to a new workspace.

key.name: enable-follow-to-workspace
key.description: If enabled, switch to the new workspace when moving a window.

key.name: enable-take-screenshot
key.description: If enabled, show the 'Take Screenshot' option in the menu to take a screenshot of the currently focused application window.

key.name: enable-app-settings
key.description: If enabled, show the 'App Settings' option in the menu to access the settings of the currently focused application window.

key.name: focused-app-icon-size
key.description: Specifies the size of the application icon displayed in the top bar, in pixels.

key.name: focused-app-title-width
key.description: Specifies the width of the application title displayed in the top bar, in pixels.
